letters.description: Comprehensive evaluation of adrenal function, lifestyle factors, and contributing stressors using validated questionnaires and lab tests.
Implementing a personalized dietary plan focused on nutrient-dense foods, balanced blood sugar, and optimal hydration to support adrenal recovery.
Prioritizing sleep hygiene, circadian rhythm optimization, and stress reduction techniques such as mindfulness and gentle movement.
Incorporating targeted supplementation, herbal remedies, and lifestyle modifications to address specific adrenal imbalances and support overall well-being.
Identifying and aligning daily activities with core values and passions to enhance energy, motivation, and long-term sustainable health.
Fostering self-awareness, resilience, and proactive self-care strategies to maintain adrenal health and prevent future fatigue.
